title: invincible49
author: invincible49
content: Reporting Ban evasion: 1. sykt62 (Archived)2. wtsimis3. Chitar1234. Abdullah56Quote from: simmeme17 on September 09, 2021, 11:30:55 AMMy account sykt62 was banned for publishing a plagiarized article. For my clarification, first of all I am a crypto blogger, so I write articles and publish them on different platforms like publish0x. Some days ago, I was banned for publishing an article titled: "What Is Your Ultimed Goal In Crypto?"This article was published long ago from my leofinance and publish0x profile. You can verify them. https://www.publish0x.com/saikots-blog/what-is-your-ultimed-goal-in-crypto-xlyplwdor https://leofinance.io/@sykt/what-is-your-ultimed-goal-in-cryptoFor more verification: https://imgur.com/lemcielhttps://imgur.com/4H3cBRPPlease verify and release sykt62 Archive: https://archive.ph/wHwyz#msg57895934https://archive.ph/wip/iEbBnhttps://archive.ph/wip/bMLovQuote from: wtsimis on October 09, 2021, 09:50:52 AMBitcointalk profile link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3379590Bitcoin Address: 1QHFeT7en6aXwDoUZobCXgfAVegZkrrJAgPortfolios: https://leofinance.io/@sykt/phemex-review-2021-or-or-trading-with-zero-fees , https://leofinance.io/@sykt/how-to-be-a-crypto-millionire-starting-with-100usd , https://leofinance.io/@sykt/how-to-earn-money-by-just-using-a-search-engine-or-or-presearch-full-review , https://leofinance.io/@sykt/freebitco-in-reviews-or-or-scam-or-or-multiple-ways-to-earn-free-btchttps://leofinance.io/@sykt/how-to-earn-money-with-beermoneyforum-com-2021Here are some of my best article links. If your need any other writer, I can give my best. https://archive.ph/IGXpC#msg58137971Quote from: wtsimis on October 07, 2021, 07:51:05 PMপ্রথমেই ভুল স্বিকার করে নিচ্ছি, কারন এক সাথে দুটি পোস্ট করা উচিত ছিলো না, কিন্ত মিম কনটেস্ট এর ডেট মনে হয় শেষ করে দিতে পারে, এর জন্য বাধ্য হয়েই এক সাথে দুটী পোষ্ট এক সাথে করছি। 1.আমার তৈরিকৃত মিম: কখনো আশা হত হবেন না মিমটির লিংক : https://twitter.com/MdxCrypto4/status/1446181207394291728/photo/1মিমটি তৈরির করার কাহিনি: ক্রিপ্টো মার্কেট আপ্স ডাউন থাকবেই, কিন্ত হ্লোডিং একদিন না একদিন আপনাকের সময়ের দাম দিবে।2.আমার তৈরিকৃত মিম: জ্ঞান বিলানো মিমটির লিংক: https://twitter.com/AaravCarrel/status/1446195619316461574?s=20মিমটি তৈরির করার কাহিনি: প্রতিবার কাউকে যখন ক্রিপ্টো ব্যপারে প্রথম বলি3. আমার তৈরিকৃত মিম: পোর্টফোলিওমিমটির লিংক: https://twitter.com/AaravCarrel/status/1446181555076927503?s=20মিমটি তৈরির করার কাহিনি: যার হ্লোডিং আছে, তার স্ক্রিনশট নেওয়ার প্রবনতা বেশি থাকে  4. আমার তৈরিকৃত মিম: কাকতালীয় মিমটির লিংক: https://imgur.com/Jf4l3uCমিমটি তৈরির করার কাহিনি: কাকতালীয় ভাবে মিলে গেছে। কিন্ত মন্দ হবে না যদি ক্রিপ্টো বাংলাদেশে ওপেন সোর্স ভাবে ব্যাবহার করা হয়।কোনো মিম তেই লোগো বা কোনো ওয়াটারর্মাক ব্যাবহার করা হয়নি, যেকেউ চাইলে,যেকোনো জায়গয়ায় ব্যবহার করতে পারেন। আর উত্থসাহ পেলে আরো বানাবো Translation: That posted twitter accounts which were clearly written by wtsimis  lead to twitter accounts with changed username after clicking! https://twitter.com/AaravCarrel/status/1446195619316461574?s=20 leads to this https://archive.ph/wip/Pnrf3 with Username Crypt311 which is actively being used by BTT user Chitar123.Quote from: Chitar123 on May 09, 2022, 07:34:02 PMTwitter Url:https://mobile.twitter.com/Crypt311Archive: https://archive.ph/wip/ecXe1And, https://twitter.com/MdxCrypto4/status/1446181207394291728/photo/1 leads to https://archive.ph/wip/Llg0U with Username San8123 which is actively being used by BTT user user Abdullah56.Quote from: Abdullah56 link=topic=5393406.msg59886304#msg59886304Proof of authenticationBitcointalk name:Abdullah56Join Campaign:TwitterTelegram:@Abdullah314Bsc Address : 0x4D34B56DFF0f36e444a94Fdd6eE2D689AfA812F8Archive: https://archive.ph/oaA0S#msg59886304According to UCT bounty rules users will be banned from campaign if found using multiple accounts! And we can see wtsimis  used both of his twitters and Bitcointalk altaccounts to enroll in the same campaign.Related Addresses:Code:BEP-20 Wallet Address: 0x4D34B56DFF0f36e444a94Fdd6eE2D689AfA812F8BEP-20 Wallet Address: 0x7cD31AAD15734C631b99c335f0b583B0A35e33aCRelated Social accounts:Code:https://leofinance.io/@sykthttps://www.publish0x.com/saikots-bloghttps://twitter.com/MdxCrypto4https://twitter.com/AaravCarrel/https://mobile.twitter.com/Crypt311

comments.author: wtsimis
comments.body: Your first accusation has slide happened. Long ago, my account was banned for plagiarism and I admit my apology for that incident. After that, I tried to follow all the rules and regulations of the forum. In the unofficial rule no 25QuoteBan evasion (using or creating accounts while one of your accounts is banned) is not allowed.[e]Quote If you get banned (temporarily or permanently) and create a new account to continue posting/sending PMs, it's considered ban evasion. The only exception is creating a thread in Meta about your ban.I tried to ban appeal to recover that account. After that I don't create any multiple accounts, I just followed to build only one account at one time and just keep my writing as rules regulation. Your second accusation about the Twitter accounts. See, I build Twitter accounts and vend them in the different marketplace as most of us know, Twitter plays a vital role in marketing in the crypto industry. These Twitter accounts vend in two/three hands before reaching the main client. I don't even know, who the people you mentioned in the thread are. On the other hand, I can give you enough proofs that I've not any kind of link with these accounts. I think your 2nd accusation is just based on hypothysis.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: wtsimis on May 12, 2022, 09:24:04 PMAfter that I don't create any multiple accounts, I just followed to build only one account at one time and just keep my writing as rules regulation. So from the list of OP which ones are your accounts.If you are telling truth then obviously you get a pass. We all learn from mistake but making same mistake again after warning is unforgivable. I hope you have not done that.

comments.author: wtsimis
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on May 12, 2022, 09:27:38 PMQuote from: wtsimis on May 12, 2022, 09:24:04 PMAfter that I don't create any multiple accounts, I just followed to build only one account at one time and just keep my writing as rules regulation. So from the list of OP which ones are your accounts.If you are telling truth then obviously you get a pass. We all learn from mistake but making same mistake again after warning is unforgivable. I hope you have not done that.The achived one: @sykt62 That account banned and I also appealed for that account that time. After realizing my fault that time I apologise for my mistakes. Now I'm working with only account and focused on only making better posts. Others accounts, I dont even know them.  I think, they just brought my created twitter accounts from different marketplaces.

comments.author: invincible49
comments.body: Quote from: Abdullah56 on May 12, 2022, 09:51:27 PMI buy this Twitter account.why alt use? Don't prove negative feedback why?As for the twitter accounts, both of those wtsimis quoted tweets now have been deleted after I created this thread and sent DM to all three respective users earlier today. Apart from that I admit that I used "Possibility" in my title because the quoted post by wtsimis shows he was owner of the mentioned twitter accounts, any real meme creators would reserve the right to at least watermark his/her contents before handing over his/her accounts to new buyers which were used for meme competitions. In that sense, yes I used "Hypothesis" to show possibility of connection between wtsimis, Abdullah56 and Chitar123 . I have learned that transactions often between wallets can't b justified for a valid accusation of alts using but in this case both  Abdullah56 and Chitar123 's wallets are also connected. https://bscscan.com/tx/0x25d8dfe3cf64fad55de9423d8aa805ae6262e9354d9d2e5eca4d44e15eed87e4

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Abdullah56 on May 12, 2022, 09:51:27 PMI buy this Twitter account.why alt use? Don't prove negative feedback why?I was talking about the bitcointalk accounts listed on the main topic.Quote from: invincible49 on May 12, 2022, 11:18:55 PMAs for the twitter accounts, both of those wtsimis quoted tweets now have been deleted after I created this thread and sent DM to all three respective users earlier today. I don't know what to take from this. It could be, they (if indeed more than one people behind the accounts) do not want hassles or it could be the same guy thought okay let's remove the connections. It's hard to make a conclusion.

comments.author: wtsimis
comments.body: Quote from: invincible49 on May 12, 2022, 11:18:55 PMAs for the twitter accounts, both of those wtsimis quoted tweets now have been deleted after I created this thread and sent DM to all three respective users earlier today. As I told before, I created those accounts and sold them in different marketplaces. They are now handled by many peoples that I even don't know. Basically, I created those accounts and build them until reached a number of followers I used them for my works or needs. Then sell them on different marketplaces. I have proof that I sold those accounts a long time ago. For meme competitions, I submitted my memes through publishing on Twitter. At that time I was building my accounts for future selling. After gathering qualitative followers in Twitter, I sold them. Quote from: invincible49 on May 12, 2022, 11:18:55 PM any real meme creators would reserve the right to at least watermark his/her contents before handing over his/her accounts to new buyers which were used for meme competitions. In our local community, very few memes are in the local language. So, I don't add any watermark, so that anyone from the community can use it openly. I think you don't read the whole translation, which tells that Quote from: wtsimis on October 07, 2021, 07:51:05 PMকোনো মিম তেই লোগো বা কোনো ওয়াটারর্মাক ব্যাবহার করা হয়নি, যেকেউ চাইলে,যেকোনো জায়গয়ায় ব্যবহার করতে পারেন। আর উত্থসাহ পেলে আরো বানাবোTranslationCode:In memes, no logos or watermarks are used, anyone can use it anywhere. And if I get encouragement, I will make more.However, thanks man, for sending me the remainder. I would never know about the accusations if you never send messages. Again, I do have not any kind of link to the last two accounts. And again I'm sorry for my past mistakes.
